cast.name: 帕德容琶·砂楚 Pachrapa Chaichua
拉提蓬·普马利 Ratiphong Phumalee
贾图荣·科利玛 Jaturong Kolimart
派罗吉·桑瓦里布 Phairote Sangwaribut

introduction: Lily is the daughter of a rich businessman. She meets Witsarut and falls in love with him. She then pretends to be poor and rents a room from Witsarut and his friends. She tells Witsarut her name is Plub Pleung which is just the Thai translation of Lily. However, Witsarut works for her dad. So throughout the whole lakorn she's putting on all sorts of disguises as Lily so that he won't know Lily the boss' daughter is the same person as Plub Pleung.
